price: آيا ته انګېرې چې د سمڅې او تختې والا زموږ له عجيبه نښانو څخه دي؟
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبۡتَ أَنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡكَهۡفِ وَٱلرَّقِيمِ كَانُواْ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا عَجَبًا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: am ḥasib'ta anna aṣḥāba al-kahfi wal-raqīmi kānū min āyātinā ʿajaban
